r.s: Decode and Encode data in Bittorrent format
r.d: This package consists of three classes which handles the encoding and decoding of data in Bittorrent format. You can also extract useful informations from .torrent files, create .torrent files and query the torrents scrape page to get its statistics. PHP5 only.
r.n: * Changed PEAR dependency to 1.5.4. See http://pear.php.net/advisory-20070507.txt * Added test case for Bug #15453
